dcterms:description: COV19-CT-DB dataset comprises a large number of annotated Covid-19 and non-Covid-19 CT scans, which can improve the learning capability for deep learning methods. However, the resolution and length of CT scans in COV19-CT-DB were inconsistent between each CT scan, making it challenging for deep neural networks to achieve promising results.
dcterms:title: COV19-CT-DB
